query:
mutation ($input0:CreateCvss3Point0SeverityInput!) {
		createCvss3Point0Severity(input:$input0) {
			clientMutationId,
			severity {
				_id,
				attack_complexity,
				attack_vector,
				author_type,
				availability,
				availability_requirement,
				calculation_method,
				confidentiality,
				confidentiality_requirement,
				created_at,
				cvss_vector_string,
				id,
				integrity,
				integrity_requirement,
				max_severity,
				privileges_required,
				rating,
				report_id,
				scope,
				score,
				score_by_rating,
				team_id,
				user_id,
				user_interaction,
			},
			was_successful,
		}
	}
